subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The good news for the Cleveland Cavaliers is that the first hour of game two of the N.B.A. Finals was matched up directly against the “Sopranos” finale on HBO.
snippet: The good news for the Cleveland Cavaliers is that the first hour of game two of the N.B.A. Finals was matched up directly against the “Sopranos” finale on HBO.
